description: Services portion of "Collective Military Training Role players and facilities - Vital Archer 23" requested from Supply Arrangement W6399-21J415. Services portion: category 1: Land exercise effects. The DND requires the provision of facilities, equipment and personnel to completed a proponents operational framework. The framework compliments the following instructions. Category 1: Land exercise effects. Category 2: Specialized facilities, platforms, and equipment. Category 3: Aviation exercise effects. Category 4: Marine exercise effects Category 5: Cyber exercise effects. Category 6: Exercise support. Category 7: Subject matter experts. Category 8: Integrated project management support for exercise.
duration_in_months: No clear duration specified for tender
full_summary:
## Collective Military Training Role Players and Facilities - Vital Archer 23

### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation)**: W6399-22CW01/A
* **Public Works and Government Services Canada (Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada)**: [11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5](https://www.google.ca/maps/place/11+Laurier+St,+Phase+III,+Place+du+Portage,+Gatineau,+QC+K1A+0S5/@45.444414,-75.7375537,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x4cd246cc1523c179:0xa0b29dbf17079954!8m2!3d45.444419!4d-75.7353647)
* **Publication Date (date de publication)**: August 26, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date (appel d'offres clôture)**: September 12, 2022, 14:00:00

### Description and Requirements

* The Department of National Defence (Ministère de la défense nationale) seeks contractors to provide role players and facilities to support collective military training events in British Columbia, Canada.
* The contractor will need to provide facilities, equipment, and personnel to support a range of key categories, including:
	+ Land Exercise Effects
	+ Specialized facilities, platforms, and equipment
	+ Aviation Exercise Effects
	+ Marine Exercise Effects
	+ Cyber Exercise Effects
	+ Exercise Support
	+ Subject Matter Experts
	+ Integrated Project Management Support

### Trade Agreements and Procurement

* This solicitation is subject to the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP).
* Suppliers must be able to demonstrate ability to meet qualification requirements.
* The procurement strategy is Competitive Procurement with the lowest/lower bid.

### Contact and Submission Information

* **Herb Choquette (Herb Choquette)**, RRMP (infrastructure), PWGSC ( Travaux publics et Services gouvernementaux Canada), [herb.choquette@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca](mailto:
